name: Everybody's Home Run Rush
description:
The popular casual baseball game has been ported to the Nintendo Switchâ„¢ with a special focus on the home run race and a multiplayer mode!

A simple and easy-to-understand party game in which players hit home runs in an exhilarating manner.

The perfect tempo and game balance will keep you entertained time and time again!
Play with others and you're sure to have a blast!

Be the Home Run King!
